meanings.sent1: My grandma keeps her freshly baked bread in the breadboxes.
meanings.sent2: The bakery had many breadboxes filled with different types of bread.
meanings.sent3: Why did the breadboxes go to school? To get a little 'breaducation'!
meanings.sent4: The breadboxes in the kitchen stood like silent guardians of the loaves.
meanings.sent5: The colorful breadboxes on the shelf brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: The kitchen had two breadboxes, one for white bread and one for wheat bread.
meanings.sent2: She bought new breadboxes to organize her kitchen better.
meanings.sent3: The breadboxes gathered around the toaster, eager to see who would pop up next.
meanings.sent4: The breadboxes on the counter looked like a small army ready for breakfast battle.
meanings.sent5: The breadboxes on the table clinked softly as they were moved aside.
